name: Intraday Adaptive Hurst Z-Score Mean Reversion
description: Trades highly-liquid U.S. large-cap equities on 15-minute bars, exploiting short-term mean-reversion signalled by the Adaptive Hurst Z-Score Reversal (AHZSR). Long entries occur when AHZSR crosses below −1.5; shorts when it crosses above +1.5. Positions exit when the indicator reverts to 0, when 1 % stop-loss or 1.5 % take-profit levels are hit, or after 10 bars (~2.5 hours) to guarantee intraday flatness.
